DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female 2 . 1318 year 3 . Body mass index ≥ 91st percentile UK growth reference chart ( Cole , 1995 ) 4 . Medications/dietary supplement interfere intervention allow , condition participant adhere regimen intervention , include oral contraceptive nonfatty acid base dietary supplement ( e.g . garlic ) 5 . Smoker nonsmoker 6 . Not participate intervention study 1 . Pregnancy lactation 2 . Endocrine disorder Polycystic Ovary Syndrome 3 . Currently treatment chronic inflammatory condition asthma 4 . Kidney liver dysfunction 5 . Iron deficiency anaemia 6 . Prescribed antiinflammatory medication 7 . Consumers fatty acid supplement include fish oil , even primrose oil antioxidant vitamin ( A , C , E , carotene ) supplement 8 . High consumer oily fish ( > 2 servings/week ) 9 . Participants plan start special diet lose weight ( e.g . Slimfast , Atkins etc ) 10 . Weight change ≥3kg within last 3 month 11 . Alcohol drug abuse ( base clinical judgement ) 12 .
